ygData.subject: Re: magic hammer
ygData.msgSnippet: The Hammer O Wrath, which we get on lvl 15, is a 1H Blunt weap.  So it sucks to be me who never payed attention to 1h Blunt. =) Tiresias Servant of Erollisi
ygData.messageBody:
The Hammer O' Wrath, which we get on lvl 15, is a 1H Blunt weap. So it
sucks to be me who never payed attention to 1h Blunt. =)

Tiresias
Servant of Erollisi Marr

> From: "Kevin Nguyen" <miniydr@...>
